OneClickCV - Create Tailored CVs and Cover Letters in One Click

Struggling to adapt your CV or cover letter for every job application? With oneclickcv, you can easily create professional, customized CVs and cover letters tailored to any job postâ€”all in just one click!

Key Features:
- Tailored Resumes: Generate CVs and cover letters customized to match the job post you're applying for, ensuring the best possible fit.
- PDF Metadata Optimization: Boost your chances of getting noticed by recruiters with correctly formatted PDF files, optimized for applicant tracking systems (ATS).
- Fast and Efficient: No more manual edits. Choose a job post and oneclickcv instantly creates a tailored document for you.

Who is it for?
